channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Dear NY Times, before we get rid of the penny, let’s open up your op-ed page to include criticism of the NYT. You can handle a little pushback, you need it desperately.
item.source:markdown: Dear NY Times, before we get rid of the penny, let’s open up your op-ed page to include criticism of the NYT. You can handle a little pushback, you need it desperately.

item.description: Dialysis May Prolong Life for Older Patients. But Not by Much.
item.source:markdown: Dialysis May Prolong Life for Older Patients. But Not by Much.

item.description: The networks should put Trump on time delay and when he says you can legally murder babies in some states, that should be treated as if he said fck or sht. Put up a screen that explains why he was cut off, then go to commercial.
item.source:markdown: The networks should put Trump on time delay and when he says you can legally murder babies in some states, that should be treated as if he said f*ck or sh*t. Put up a screen that explains why he was cut off, then go to commercial.

item.description: Paul Graham wrote a very useful piece about "Founder Mode." As a founder myself, I think I can tell you why founders have a central role to play as a company grows.
item.source:markdown: Paul Graham wrote a very useful piece about "Founder Mode." As a founder myself, I think I can tell you why founders have a central role to play as a company grows.

item.description: It's totally okay that Bluesky and Mastodon don't interop. We can flatten it out, as earlier developers did with TCP.
item.source:markdown: It's totally okay that Bluesky and Mastodon don't interop. We can flatten it out, as earlier developers did with TCP.

item.description: The press took its best shot at Kamala Harris, and it was a big puff of smoke, she just cruised right through it.

item.description: Feature I really need: A way to search all of my conversations with ChatGPT. It's the one feature I'm most missing, and the most surprising. I'm sure there's a huge amount of utility locked up in that.
item.source:markdown: Feature I really need: A way to search all of my conversations with ChatGPT. It's the one feature I'm most missing, and the most surprising. I'm sure there's a huge amount of utility locked up in that.

item.description: Believe it or not, there was a time when it was controversial to think that the web would be two-way, meaning that normal people would be able to publish. Here's the outline of a speech I gave in Y2K at an XML conference in San Jose.

item.description: Note to the Harris campaign: This Google search should return a complete list of your ads. Or a pointer to a site with a complete list of your ads. I want to make sure everyone who follows me sees every one of them! Let us help you help us.

item.description: "Whenever I, or someone else, posts a link to this blog on Mastodon, it DDoS's me and brings the site down for a couple minutes."

item.description: I learned that there were hippie programmers, who loved programming the way hippies love acid rock, weed, making love not war, patchouli oil, The Dead, getting back to the land, saying truth to power, sticking it to the man, etc etc.
